desc: Need to clone (duplicate) existing PHP code and modify to add 3 data elements in Customer Record.This code is currently in production that cover several existing customers.  The newly modified code is targeted for a different customer which uses a different CRM hence the new XML record format.    The new Customer can be identified by a unique FB Ad Account ID which is posted to our dashboard.This basic code makes API calls to fetch Facebook Lead Ad records and creates XML records in the Automotive Data Format.  (see attached format to be used for the NEW CRM records).  You can use majority of the existing code to create the data elements for Car Make, Model, and Year.    It's the Customer Record that requires 3 new fields.The new data elements required are :Use the FB Name field data to create 2 data elements for 1st_Name and Last_Name per record format.  Populate a "Comment" data element and insert the content from Text field called "Best Contact Method"  from Facebook to this field.Payments will be condition on:1) Create a successful NEW XML record for the new CRM and new Ad Account2) Clone the copy of the existing code that inserts a copy of the new lead to our database.  This is to avoid sending duplicate records to CRM.3) Email the newly found lead record to the New CRM4) We will validate if the record was inserted successfully into the CRM5) Create a new CRON job to look for FB leads every 30 minutes.  There is a cron job now running for existing customer groups.If you know Facebook API and XML this is not a very difficult project.  As part of the final selection process, we will authorize you to just fetch the FB data to see if you are able to generate API calls.Thank you for your interest.  Skype interview will be required.  We have on-going development and reporting to follow up wiht this project.
title: Social Media Marketing  -- 2

desc: I am Fahad Hassen, and I own a web designing business at [url removed, login to view] - I have many clients wanting PPC management and I am considering your services. Can you please send me a list of current campaigns you manage with expected results/clickthrough rates?I do not need the actual client info, but I need the exact figures. For example, if you are managing a campaign for a dentist, I would want to know the1) Average Cost Per Click2) Average Customer Conversion Information (In dollars/percentages - the more info, better)3) The Industry/Niche and Location.For example, you could say you are advertising for a New York dentist for $600 a month, getting these results etc etc.Actual client info would be so much better, but if you have a reason to withhold it, it is fine. But actual client info (I will verify) would almost guarantee your acceptance. For example, if you have a dentist in Buffalo, NY who is successful with an ROI, I can easily get a few dentists in other areas from my vast client list.I just need more convincing info in order for me to get the clients to use your services.Thanks..

desc: As our Social Media Marketing Manager, you'll need to:•	develop a social media strategy and set goals to increase brand awareness and increase engagement•	manage all social media channels such as Facebook, Instagram and Twitter•	plan content and delivery and use tools to manage multiple social media channels•	develop and manage competitions and campaigns that promote Lethal•	write engaging social media posts and articles•	create engaging multimedia content such as graphics and videos that is in-line with our theme, narrative, style, tone and voice, and/or outsource this effectively•	develop brand theme and narrative.•	form key relationships with influencers across the social media platforms•	manage and facilitate social media communities by responding to social media posts and developing discussions•	monitor and report on performance on social media platforms using tools such as Google AnalyticsSkills & Experience•	Demonstrated knowledge of social media best practices to drive a positive community sentiment and a proven track record for cost effectively growing brand communities in the social media space•	Experience in developing monthly content calendars•	Experience in social media advertising, specifically Facebook•	Experience with Photoshop and experience with tools for video creation•	Ideally prior experience within digital music business•	Exceptional written and verbal communications skills•	A high level of self-motivation, attention to detail and organisation skills. You will be driving and owning this role, sometimes with minimum oversight and guidance.Contract rate offered commensurate with experience.
title: Social Media Marketing contract role: Digital Music Industry

desc: We are on a online shoe business in Hong Kong. Our website is [url removed, login to view] - We are looking to hire someone who is good with shopify and it's apps and also someone who is good with social media marketing. Apart from this, we are looking to set up a discount referral code through shopify, something like [url removed, login to view] but we are facing issues as we want to offer a reward of HK$20/pair (repeat /pair) to both the referrer and the referred. Let's say for example Alice is a customer of [url removed, login to view] and she refers Betty to us and Betty ends up buying 2 pairs of shoes. So Alice and Betty both must get a HK$40 credit to their account which they can apply for their next purchase from us. And let's say that Betty recommends Celine to us and Celine ends up buying 3 pairs from us, then Betty and Celina will each get a HK$60 credit in their account and the chain must continue like that. Referralcandy says they dont have the technology to do this, but i'm not sure.
